Parazoom jQuery Plugin

  • Get started
  • Examples

Get started

  1. Home
  2. Get started

Download latest parazoom.min.js library and include it after jQuery.

Your markup

<img src="your-image.jpg" alt="Alt text">

Include libraries

<script src="jquery.js"></script>
<script src="parazoom.min.js"></script>

Call the plugin

jQuery('img').parazoom();

Watch examples

Parazoom jQuery Plugin

A jQuery plugin that adds cool mouse hover features on images.
